mapper.select: SELECT c.cid, c.sender_uid, s.user_name as 'sender_name', s.avatar as 'sender_avatar', a.user_name as 'answer_name', a.avatar as 'answer_avatar', c.answer_uid, c.bid, c.content, c.create_time, c.modify_time, c.like_number FROM (SELECT * FROM notebook.comment WHERE bid = #{}) as c, notebook.user s, notebook.user a WHERE s.uid = c.sender_uid AND a.uid = c.answer_uid ORDER BY create_time DESC;
